methods.description: Outputs a string to the stdout unless an outputHandle is provided
methods.name: output

params.description: The callback(out) that will receive output instead of stdout
params.name: outputHandler

params.description: The compression format, must exactly match one of these "zip", "tar", "tgz"
params.name: format

params.description: packHandler: Entry callback function(error, entry, entrySize, totalSize, totalCount), outputHandler: Default output callback function(out), redirects stdout when provided, doneHandler: Default done callback function(error, data)
params.name: options

methods.description: Access nested object properties by path
methods.name: resolveObject

params.description: The object that contains the property
params.name: obj

params.description: The compression format, must exactly match one of these "zip", "tar", "tgz"
params.name: format

params.description: unpackHandler: Entry callback function(error, entry, entrySize, totalSize, totalCount), outputHandler: Default output callback function(out), redirects stdout when provided, doneHandler: Default done callback function(error, data)
params.name: options
